item.title: Transfer Files to Your AWS S3 Storage in Linux
item.description: Uploading files to an AWS S3 storage can be difficult through the GUI with many files included or if your files are in a server where you don’t have a GUI option. Use following tool to transfer files to an S3 bucket. Download following tool and install: cd ~/Downloads git clone https://github.com/s3tools/s3cmd.git cd s3cmd/ sudo python setup.py install Next, execute following to create a configuration file to connect to your AWS S3 account:
